edu.cornell

Class FileFormatAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cornell.FileFormatAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileFormatInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVFileFormat, HMPFileFormat, TXTFileFormat

    public abstract class FileFormatAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileFormatInterface
    Provides generic methods for genotype files of different file formats.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Tony Yang

      • getRecord

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRecord()
        Description copied from interface: FileFormatInterface
        Reads through each line of the input file. Converts the genotype records for each line using convertRecord from Utils class. The record includes both the dna marker and genotype data. Returns the converted genotype record
        Specified by:
        getRecord in interface FileFormatInterface
        Returns:
        The converted genotype record as a list

      • closeFile

        public void closeFile()
        Description copied from interface: FileFormatInterface
        Closes the input file if the scanner is open. If the input file does not exist, the method will be called.
        Specified by:
        closeFile in interface FileFormatInterface
